content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Replace fixed page_size approach with dynamic page building in paginate_array - scan from start for each page request
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for paginate_array changes
Replace fixed page_size approach with dynamic page building in paginate_object - scan from start for each page request
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for paginate_object changes
Update both functions to calculate total_pages by scanning entire dataset once
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for total_pages calculation
Extract common dynamic page-building logic into a generic helper function
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for helper extraction
Refactor paginate_array to use the new generic helper
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for paginate_array refactor
Refactor paginate_object to use the new generic helper
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for paginate_object refactor
Enhance error messages to include item index/key when item is too large
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for error message enhancement
Add test for array with variable-sized items (small at start, large in middle)
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for variable-sized array test
Add test for object with variable-sized items
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for variable-sized object test
Add test for oversized single item error scenario
build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings for oversized item test

run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings -W clippy::all -W clippy::pedantic -W clippy::nursery -W clippy::cargo -A clippy::multiple_crate_versions -A clippy::cargo_common_metadata
fix any clippy issues following rules: do not mark code as dead, remove unused variables instead of prefixing with _
run cargo +nightly fmt
run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
STOP work here and return control to main agent

task a new subagent to do a code review of the changes in the worktree - tell it to focus on identifying duplication and complexity. emphasize that it should only read and analyze, not modify anything.
when this new subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
